Name: Rabat-Sale-Kenitra
Description: The region surrounding the capital Rabat, known for its rich history and coastal landscapes.

Name: Casablanca-Settat
Description: Morocco s economic hub, home to the largest city, Casablanca, and major industrial centers.

Name: Marrakech-Safi
Description: Famous for the historic city of Marrakech and its scenic landscapes.

Name: Fes-Meknes
Description: Home to the ancient cities of Fes and Meknes, known for their medieval history.

Name: Beni Mellal-Khenifra
Description: Known for its beautiful mountain landscapes and agricultural activities.

Name: Draa-Tafilalet
Description: A region known for its desert landscapes, including the Sahara and the Draa Valley.

Name: Oriental
Description: A region with a rich history and diverse culture, known for its Mediterranean coastline.

Name: Souss-Massa
Description: Located along the southern coast, famous for its beaches and agriculture.

Name: Guelmim-Oued Noun
Description: A region in southern Morocco, known for its desert landscapes and nomadic traditions.

Name: Laayoune-Sakia El Hamra
Description: The largest region in the Western Sahara, known for its desert and coastal environment.

Name: Dakhla-Oued Ed-Dahab
Description: A coastal region in the far south of Morocco, known for its beaches and fishing industry.
